GET /api.description: Serves a JSON representation of all available endpoints of the API.

GET /api/topics.description: Serves an array of all topics.

POST /api/topics.description: Adds a new topic to the database.

request_body.slug: String - The name of the topic (required)
request_body.description: String - The description of the topic (required)

topic.description: The description of the newly created topic

GET /api/articles.description: Responds with an array of article objects. Accepts queries: `topic` (filters articles by topic), `sort_by` (sorts articles by any valid column, defaults to `created_at`), `order` (asc or desc, defaults to desc), `limit` (number of articles per page), `page` (for pagination).

parameters.sort_by: Column name to sort articles (e.g., article_id, title, topic, author, created_at, votes, comment_count).
parameters.topic: Filter articles by the specified topic.

responses.400: Bad request for invalid query parameters.
responses.404: Not found if the specified topic does not exist.

articles.title: Seafood substitutions are increasing
articles.author: weegembump
articles.body: 'SEAFOOD fraud is a serious global problem', begins a recent report from Oceana...

exampleResponse.total_count: Total number of articles matching the query.

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves a specific article object by `article_id`.

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves an array of all comments associated with the specified `article_id`.

comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists...
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles.description: Adds a new article to the database.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Accepts a comment object for the specified `article_id` and serves the posted comment.

comment.body: You are not good at writing news articles.
comment.author: icellusedkars

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Updates the votes for a comment by `comment_id`.

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes the specified comment by `comment_id`. Returns no content.

GET /api/users.description: Serves an array of all users.
